phrasetype.name: User Tools (global)
phrasetype.phrase: Here you can select any number of forums to exclude from the forums list, from "get new" search and from "get daily" search.
To select multiple forums, press and hold CTRL key while clicking on the forum titles. To clear exclusion, select "Reset Exclusion" without holding CTRL key.
